spell_tooltip.description:
You bolster nearby allies within 15 yards, increasing their maximum health by 15%.

The duration of all stun effects on you is reduced by 15%.
Charge to an enemy, stunning them for 3 sec and knocking back their allies within 15 yards.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 14,365 Arcane damage to the target, and 4,997 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 3,296 Nature damage and then an additional 31,197 Nature damage over 13.5 sec.
Increases Swipe damage by 100%.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 10,158 for 7 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 3%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Increases the range of all of your abilities by 3 yards.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

Increases your damage and healing by 3% during the day.

Increases your Versatility by 2% during the night.
Blasts targets within 21 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 52,004 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 18 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Increases Typhoon's radius by 20% and its range by 5 yds.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 13 yards for 3 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.

You gain 6% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.
Maul the target for 33,010 Physical damage.
Thrash, Swipe, Moonfire, and Maul have a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Mangle, and to cause it to generate an additional 4 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 50% for 6 sec.

When you take non-periodic damage, you have a chance equal to your critical strike to cause your next Regrowth to heal for an additional 200%, and to be instant, free, and castable in all forms for 30 sec. 

This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 sec.

Sharp brambles protect you, absorbing and reflecting up to 1,048 damage from each attack.

While Barkskin is active, the brambles also deal 728 Nature damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec.
Mangle deals 20% additional damage against bleeding targets.

Frenzied Regeneration's healing is increased by up to 120% based on your missing health.

Frenzied Regeneration has 1 additional charge.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldowns of Mangle, Thrash, and Growl by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Mangle has a 15% chance to reduce the Rage cost of your next Ironfur by 25%.
Maul and Raze have an additional 30% chance to critically strike.
Reduces the cooldowns of Barkskin and Survival Instincts by 30%.
Mangle increases the damage of your next cast of Maul or Raze, and casting Maul or Raze increases the damage of your next Mangle by 15%. Stacks up to 3.

Autoattacks have a 20% chance to empower your next cast of Maul or Raze, stacking up to 2 times.

An empowered cast of Maul or Raze deals 40% increased damage, costs 100% less rage, and reduces the target's damage to you by 15% for 6 sec.
Mangle generates 5 more Rage and deals 25% more damage.
When you cast Ironfur, also deal Physical damage equal to 20% of your armor, split among enemies within 15 yards. Damage reduced above 4 applications.
Every 200 Rage you spend causes a burst of restorative energy, healing allies within 15 yds for 99,849.

Go berserk for 15 sec, increasing haste by 15%, and reducing the rage cost of Maul by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.

Go berserk for 15 sec, reducing the cooldown of Frenzied Regeneration by 100% and cost of Ironfur by 50%.

Combines with other Berserk abilities.
Each stack of Thrash reduces the target's damage to you by 2% and increases your damage to them by 2%.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.

Your damage has a 5% chance to trigger a free automatic Moonfire on that target. 

When this occurs, the next Moonfire you cast generates 8 Rage, and deals 300% increased direct damage.
Thrash and Maul grant you an absorb shield for 45% of the damage dealt for 15 sec.
Thrash also generates 3 Rage each time it deals damage, on up to 5 targets.

An improved Bear Form that grants the benefits of Berserk, causes Mangle to hit up to 3 targets, and increases maximum health by 30%.

Lasts 30 sec. You may freely shapeshift in and out of this improved Bear Form for its duration.
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Strike with the might of Ursoc, dealing 18,128 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc: 
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the cooldown of Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc by 1 sec.

 Convoke the Spirits: 
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Unleashes the rage of Ursoc for 10 sec, preventing 25% of all damage you take, increasing your damage done by 15%, granting you 25% leech, and reflecting 7,863 Nature damage back at your attackers.
Enemies have their movement speed reduced by 30% for 8 sec when removing your Restoration heal over time effects, stacking.  Enemies are silenced and rooted for 3 sec at 3 stacks.
Cyclone leaves the target reeling, reducing their damage and healing by 15% for 3 sec.

Wild Growth is now instant cast, and when you heal 6 allies with Wild Growth you gain Full Bloom. This effect has a 30 sec cooldown.

Full Bloom
Your next Wild Growth applies Lifebloom to all targets at 100% effectiveness. Lasts for 30 sec.

Rake the target for 2,864 Bleed damage and an additional 25,174 Bleed damage over 11.3 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 14,565 Arcane damage to the target, and 5,089 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 3,213 Nature damage and then an additional 31,197 Nature damage over 13.5 sec.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 16,256 over 6 sec
   2 points: 24,384 over 9 sec
   3 points: 32,512 over 12 sec
   4 points: 40,640 over 15 sec
   5 points: 48,768 over 18 sec
Increases Swipe damage by 100%.
Heals up to 5 injured allies within 30 yards of the target for 23,431 over 5.9 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.
Nature's Cure additionally removes all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Sunfire now applies its damage over time effect to all enemies within 8 yards.
Increases armor by 10,158 for 7 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Healing done and healing taken increased by 4%.
Increases the range of all of your abilities by 3 yards.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

Increases your damage and healing by 3% during the day.

Increases your Versatility by 2% during the night.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 52,004 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 18 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 13 yards for 3 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.

You gain 6% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.

Heals the target for 44,829 over 12.8 sec. When Lifebloom expires or is dispelled, the target is instantly healed for 22,485.

May be active on one target at a time.
Heals you for 3% of your maximum health every 5 sec. If you are at full health, an injured party or raid member will be healed instead.
Your next Regrowth, Rebirth, or Entangling Roots is instant, free, castable in all forms, and heals for an additional 100%.
Your healing over time from Lifebloom has a 4% chance to cause a Clearcasting state, making your next Regrowth cost no mana.
Swiftmend heals the target for 27,196 over 7.7 sec.
Clearcast Regrowths heal for an additional 30%.
Regrowth's initial heal has a 40% increased chance for a critical effect if the target is already affected by Regrowth.
Protects a friendly target for 30 sec. Any damage taken will consume the ward and heal the target for 75,960 over 6.8 sec.
Grows a healing blossom at the target location, restoring 3,774 health to three injured allies within 10 yards every 1.7 sec for 30 sec. Limit 1.
The target's skin becomes as tough as Ironwood, reducing damage taken by 20% for 12 sec.
Swiftmend increases the healing of your next Regrowth or Rejuvenation by 150%, or your next Wild Growth by 50%.

Summons a Treant which will immediately cast Swiftmend on your current target, healing for 30,937.  The Treant will cast Nourish on that target or a nearby ally periodically, healing for 8,431. Lasts 15 sec.
When Rejuvenation heals a target below 60% health, it applies Cultivation to the target, healing them for 3,729 over 5.1 sec.
When Lifebloom blooms, up to 3 targets within your Efflorescence are healed for 15,994.
Regrowth's healing over time is increased by 50%, and it also applies to the target of your Lifebloom.

Nourish
Regrowth decreases the cast time of your next Nourish by 33% and causes it to receive an additional 33% bonus from Mastery: Harmony. Stacks up to 3 times.

Grove Guardians
Treants from Grove Guardians also cast Wild Growth immediately when summoned, healing 5 allies within 40 yds for 11,157 over 5.9 sec.
Lifebloom counts for 3 stacks of Mastery: Harmony.
Wild Growth's healing falls off 30% less over time.
Each target healed by Efflorescence is healed for an additional 2,665 over 5.1 sec.

Call upon the Night Fae for an eruption of energy, channeling a rapid flurry of 12 Druid spells and abilities over 3 sec.

You will cast Wild Growth, Swiftmend, Moonfire, Wrath, Regrowth, Rejuvenation, Rake, and Thrash on appropriate nearby targets, favoring your current shapeshift form.

Command a swarm that heals 31,380 or deals 29,882 Shadow damage over 9 sec to a target, and increases the effectiveness of your periodic effects on them by 25%.

Upon expiration, finds a new target, preferring to alternate between friend and foe up to 3 times.
Extends the duration of all of your heal over time effects on friendly targets within 60 yards by 6 sec, and increases the rate of your heal over time effects by 25% for 6 sec.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage 25% faster, and your healing over time effects heal 5% faster.

Incarnation: Tree of Life
During Incarnation: Tree of Life, you summon a Grove Guardian every 10 sec. The cooldown of Incarnation: Tree of Life is reduced by 5.0 sec when Grove Guardians fade.

 Convoke the Spirits
Convoke the Spirits' cooldown is reduced by 50% and its duration and number of spells cast is reduced by 25%. Convoke the Spirits has an increased chance to use an exceptional spell or ability.
Lifebloom's healing is increased by 3.0% each time it heals, up to 45%. Also increases Lifebloom's final bloom amount by 7%.
Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.

While your Lifebloom is on yourself, your periodic heals heal 20% faster.

While your Lifebloom is on an ally, your periodic heals on them have a 4% chance to cause it to bloom.
You may Lifebloom two targets at once, but Lifebloom's healing is reduced by 10%.
Starsurge grants 4% spell critical strike chance to 8 allies within 40 yards for 18 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Entering an Eclipse summons a beam of light at your location granting you 50% reduction in silence and interrupts for 6 sec.
Using Moonfire on a target already afflicted by Moonfire's damage over time effect deals 35% additional direct damage.
Heals you for 32% health over 3 sec, and increases healing received by 20%.
Heals the target for 29,626 over 10.2 sec.

Call down a burst of energy, causing 10,619 Arcane damage to the target, and 3,563 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 10 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Astral Power.
Barkskin's duration is increased by 4 sec.
Consumes a Regrowth, Wild Growth, or Rejuvenation effect to instantly heal an ally for 84,244.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 3,238 Nature damage and then an additional 31,197 Nature damage over 13.5 sec.
Launch a surge of stellar energies at the target, dealing 23,798 Astral damage.
Frenzied Regeneration and Barkskin increase all healing received by 20%.
Nullifies corrupting effects on the friendly target, removing all Curse and Poison effects.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Sunfire now applies its damage over time effect to all enemies within 8 yards.
Increases armor by 10,158 for 7 sec.
Magical damage and healing increased by 6%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Increases the range of all of your abilities by 3 yards.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

Increases your damage and healing by 3% during the day.

Increases your Versatility by 2% during the night.
Blasts targets within 21 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you use Barkskin or Survival Instincts, absorb 52,004 damage for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 18 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 13 yards for 3 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.

You gain 6% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.

Casting 2 Starfires empowers Wrath for 15 sec. Casting 2 Wraths empowers Starfire for 15 sec.

 Eclipse (Solar)
Nature spells deal 15% additional damage and Wrath damage is increased by 40%.

 Eclipse (Lunar)
Arcane spells deal 15% additional damage and the damage Starfire deals to nearby enemies is increased by 30%.
Moonfire and Sunfire damage over time has a chance to call down a falling star, dealing 3,423 Astral damage and generating 2 Astral Power.
Summons a beam of solar light over an enemy target's location, interrupting the target and silencing all enemies within the beam. Lasts 8 sec.
During the first 6 sec of every Eclipse, Shooting Stars fall 200% more often.
Calls down waves of falling stars upon enemies within 43 yds, dealing 17,102 Astral damage over 8 sec. Multiple uses of this ability may overlap.
Your Wrath and Starfire chance to critically strike is increased by 12% and they generate 2 additional Astral Power.
Moonfire deals 10% increased damage and also hits another nearby enemy within 15 yds of the target.
Starfall deals 20% increased damage.
Your critical strikes from Starfire and Wrath cause the target to languish for an additional 80% of your spell's damage over 6 sec.
Celestial bodies align, maintaining both Eclipses and granting 10% haste for 20 sec.
When you have 3 periodic effects from your spells on a target, your damage and healing on them are increased by 10%.
Solar Eclipse increases Wrath's Astral power generation by 60% and Lunar Eclipse increases Starfire's damage and Astral Power generation by 20% for each target hit beyond the first, up to 60%.
Every 600 Astral Power spent grants Celestial Alignment for 12 sec.
Casting Starfall extends the duration of active Moonfires and Sunfires by 4 sec, up to 28 sec.
Your Moonfire, Sunfire, and Stellar Flare deal damage 25% faster.

Starsurge and Starfall grant you 4% Haste for 15 sec.

Stacks up to 3 times. Gaining a stack does not refresh the duration.
Every 30th Shooting Star calls down a Full Moon at 60% effectiveness upon its target.
Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 16%, decreasing by 2% every 1 sec.
Starsurge has a chance to summon the Spirit of Goldrinn, which immediately deals 27,222 Astral damage to the target.
Starsurge and Starfall deal 12% increased damage and their cost is reduced by 10%.
Your Moonfire and Sunfire have a chance to summon a Faerie Dragon to assist you in battle for 30 sec.

An improved Moonkin Form that grants both Eclipses, any learned Celestial Alignment bonuses, and 10% critical strike chance.

Lasts 30 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Moonkin Form for its duration.

Calls down a beam of pure celestial energy that follows the enemy, dealing up to 39,043 Astral damage over 8 sec within its area. Damage reduced on secondary targets.

Generates 48 Astral Power over its duration.
When a Faerie Dragon is summoned, your spells deal 10% increased damage for 20 sec.

New Moon, Half Moon, and Full Moon deal 25% increased damage. Full Moon becomes Full Moon once more before resetting to New Moon.

Fury of Elune deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Your Travel Form movement speed while within a Battleground or Arena is increased by 20% and you always move at 100% movement speed while in Travel Form.
For every enemy you have Rip active on, your movement speed and healing received is increased by 5%. Stacks 4 times.
Interrupting a spell with Skull Bash reduces the remaining cooldown of Tiger's Fury, Survival Instincts, and Dash by 10 sec.

Rake the target for 2,921 Bleed damage and an additional 25,174 Bleed damage over 11.3 sec. 

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec and deal 60% increased damage.

Awards 1 combo point.
Call down a burst of energy, causing 14,691 Arcane damage to the target, and 4,930 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Thrash all nearby enemies, dealing immediate physical damage and periodic bleed damage. Damage varies by shapeshift form.
A quick beam of solar light burns the enemy for 3,318 Nature damage and then an additional 31,197 Nature damage over 13.5 sec.

Finishing move that causes Bleed damage over time. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 16,256 over 6 sec
   2 points: 24,384 over 9 sec
   3 points: 32,512 over 12 sec
   4 points: 40,640 over 15 sec
   5 points: 48,768 over 18 sec
Increases Swipe damage by 100%.

Shapeshift into Moonkin Form, increasing the damage of your spells by 10% and your armor by 125%, and granting protection from Polymorph effects.

The act of shapeshifting frees you from movement impairing effects.
Physical damage and Armor increased by 6%.
Increases armor by 10,158 for 7 sec.
Increases your movement speed by 15%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Fly to a nearby ally's position.
Increases the range of all of your abilities by 3 yards.
You charge and bash the target's skull, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Soothes the target, dispelling all enrage effects.

Increases your damage and healing by 3% during the day.

Increases your Versatility by 2% during the night.
Blasts targets within 21 yards in front of you with a violent Typhoon, knocking them back and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 6 sec. Usable in all shapeshift forms.

When you critically strike with an attack that generates a combo point, you gain an additional combo point.

Damage over time cannot trigger this effect.
Shift into Bear Form and let loose a wild roar, increasing the movement speed of all friendly players within 18 yards by 60% for 8 sec.
Shift into Bear Form and invoke the spirit of Ursol to let loose a deafening roar, incapacitating all enemies within 13 yards for 3 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.

You gain 6% of a stat while in each form:

No Form: Haste
Cat Form: Critical Strike
Bear Form: Versatility
Moonkin Form: Mastery

Conjures a vortex of wind for 10 sec at the destination, reducing the movement speed of all enemies within 8 yards by 50%. The first time an enemy attempts to leave the vortex, winds will pull that enemy back to its center. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
When you fall below 40% health, you cast Frenzied Regeneration, up to once every 120 sec.
Cooldown reduced by 60 sec.
Instantly heals you for 30% of maximum health. Usable in all shapeshift forms.
Infuse a friendly healer with energy, allowing them to cast spells without spending mana for 8 sec.
For 15 sec, all single-target damage also heals a nearby friendly target for 20% of the damage done.
Instantly restores 50 Energy, and increases the damage of all your attacks by 15% for their full duration. Lasts 10 sec.
Your auto attacks have a chance to cause a Clearcasting state, making your next Shred, Thrash, or Swipe cost no Energy.
Attacking an enemy with Shred fixates your attention on it for 10 sec. You can fixate on a single target at once. Your attacks deal 8% increased damage to your fixated target.

Finishing move that deals instant damage and applies Rip to all enemies within 14 yards. Lasts longer per combo point.

   1 point  : 2,295 plus Rip for 3 sec
   2 points: 3,393 plus Rip for 5 sec
   3 points: 4,621 plus Rip for 6 sec
   4 points: 5,832 plus Rip for 8 sec
   5 points: 6,865 plus Rip for 9 sec
The cooldown on Tiger's Fury resets when a target dies with one of your Bleed effects active, and Tiger's Fury lasts 5 additional seconds.
Primal Wrath consumes up to 4 sec of Rip damage on targets it hits and deals 50% of it instantly.
Rake also applies Rake to 1 additional nearby target.
Ferocious Bite deals 15% increased damage and increases all damage dealt by Rip by 5% per Combo Point spent for 4 sec.

While stealthed, Rake will also stun the target for 4 sec, and deal 60% increased damage for its full duration.

While stealthed, Shred deals 60% increased damage, has double the chance to critically strike, and generates 1 additional combo point.
Finishing moves have a 6% chance per combo point spent to make your next Rake or Shred deal damage as though you were stealthed.
Reduces all damage you take by 50% for 6 sec.
Rake damage increased by 30%, and Rake causes an Infected Wound in the target, reducing the target's movement speed by 20% for 12 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to make your next Regrowth or Entangling Roots instant, free, and castable in all forms.

Go Berserk for 20 sec. While Berserk:

Generate 1 combo point every 1.5 sec. Combo point generating abilities generate 1 additional combo point. Finishing moves restore up to 3 combo points generated over the cap.

Shred and Rake damage increased by 50%.
Rip damage increased by 18%.
Finishing moves extend the duration of Tiger's Fury by 0.4 sec per combo point spent.
Each combo point spent reduces the cooldown of Berserk by 0.5 sec.
Omen of Clarity now triggers 50% more often, can accumulate up to 2 charges, and increases the damage of your next Shred, Thrash, or Swipe by 15%.
During Berserk your combo point-generating abilities bleed the target for an additional 100% of their damage over 8 sec.

Strikes all nearby enemies with a massive slash, inflicting 22,063 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Awards 1 combo point.
Tiger's Fury's damage bonus is increased by 6%.
Finishing moves have a 6% chance per combo point spent to grant 10% Haste for 6 sec.
When you use 3 different combo point-generating abilities within 4 sec, the damage of your next 3 Rips or Ferocious Bites is increased by 25% for their full duration.

An improved Cat Form that grants all of your known Berserk effects and lasts 30 sec. You may shapeshift in and out of this improved Cat Form for its duration. During Incarnation:

Energy cost of all Cat Form abilities is reduced by 20%, and Prowl can be used once while in combat.
Your finishing moves grant 3 Energy per combo point spent and deal 5% increased damage.
Applying Rip to a target also applies a Tear that deals 15% of the new Rip's damage over 6 sec.

Unleash a furious frenzy, clawing your target 5 times for 8,583 Physical damage and an additional 63,427 Bleed damage over 4.5 sec.

Awards 5 combo points.
Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 20% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.
Rip damage has a 7.2% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.
